page.title: 12VILLAGE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Activities in{Higham-on-the-Hill revolve around the{Community Centre. Clubs which meet include Youth,Drama, Junior drama,Judo,Brownies,Cubs,Scouts After eight club,Womens'Institute, Mothers'Union,Self help Yoga,and the Happy Circle for Senior Citizens. THe{Youth Support Group}have an advisory session to help school leavers in search of work. The Church social committee arranges social evenings.A Harvest supper takes place each year.Social evenings are held also at the Methodist Chapel-and a carol service at Christmas. Two women started the{'Higham Trust' organising Fetes,Whist Drives,Social evenings to raise funds for provision of extra equipment at Higham Grange Rehabilitation Centre. Village is used by{new inhabitants as a dormitory-take little interest.
